original_text: We sailed slowly for several days. It was difficult to sail, but after some time we arrived near the town of Cnidus. Because of the strong wind, we could not continue to sail in that direction. So we sailed along the side of the island called Crete, where the wind was not strong. We sailed past the point of land called Salmone.
korean_text: 배가 더디 가 여러 날 만에 간신히 니도 맞은편에 이르러 풍세가 더 허락하지 아니하므로 살모네 앞을 지나 그레데 해안을 바람막이로 항해하여

sentences.original_text: We sailed slowly for several days.
but after some time we arrived near the town of Cnidus.
sentences.korean_translation: 얼마 후 우리는 크니다스 마을 근처에 도착했습니다.

sentences.original_text: we could not continue to sail in that direction.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그 방향으로 계속 항해할 수 없었습니다.

sentences.original_text: So we sailed along the side of the island called Crete,
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 우리는 크레테라는 섬의 해안을 따라 항해했는데,

sentences.original_text: where the wind was not strong.
We sailed past the point of land called Salmone.
